text: Sano pati gachisoomedwaga kukwao ma Ȃya Getu gakupikanika, akasatiji: “Nganijuŵa aju (Muhammadi ﷺ) ikaŵeje mundu jwaakusaka kunsiŵilila ku yaŵaliji nkuigalagatila achatati ŵenu.” Ni akasatiji soni: “Nganijiŵa aji (Qur’an) ikaŵeje unami waukusepedwa.” Ni akasaŵechetaga aŵala ŵaakufuulu pakuigamba yakuona ndema jakwaichilila: “Nganiyiŵa ayi ikaŵeje usaŵi wakuonechela.”
